attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Life to mean Life no release for good behaviour - 5 years for carrying any weapon - Prison for car drivers that kill - police to actually police - Life for Child abusers - proper Education for our kids - Clean and Safe Hospitals - Look after us Brits First - Commuity Charge Capped - Border Control
- More for Teenagers - Crackdown on drugs - Halt Nanny State - Referendum on EEC Treaty

rejection.details: Petition title must highlight a specific issue.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
